home.title: Get rewards for browsing
home.subTitle: Control what data you share and get rewarded for it.
home.wtmAnswer: Tegger knows that your data is extremely valuable to sites and advertisers. We recognize your role by rewarding you for browsing.
home.solution: Tegger is a revolutionary technological platform that lets you take back control of the data you share.
home.solutionParagraph: Simply browse or complete our surveys to earn products and experiences. Tegger also distributes the value of the information generated to sites and content creators so they can keep creating the quality content you love.
home.rewardsContent: Get rewards for viewing the content you love
home.controlContent: Choose what you want to share

whyUseTegger.wutTitle: Browse online content or tell us about yourself to get rewards.
whyUseTegger.wutSubTitle: Tegger gives you the tools to choose what you share.
whyUseTegger.wutLevel: Level up by answering questions about yourself
whyUseTegger.wutMP: Exchange tokens for rewards in our Marketplace

wallet: Wallet to check balance and transactions

news.title: NEWS
wts: Tegger distributes the value of online data

You can redeem your tokens for exclusive products. Tegger will also distribute a part of the information´s value to the sites and content creators you read so they can keep creating the quality content you love

wwa.wwaSubTitle: Tegger is technological platform that fairly distributes the value of the data generated online by rewarding users, sites, and content creators
wwa.wwaEPSubTitle: Tegger is designed to solve a multi-faceted problem in the digital ecosystem
wwa.wwaEPSectionA: Independent sites have little or no knowledge on who their audiences are. This limits their ability to create curated content for readers and sell advertising space accurately.
wwa.wwaEPSectionB: Users receive very little in exchange for the information they generate while browsing online. This information is extremely valuable for sites and advertisers, we believe users deserve a piece of the pie.
wwa.wwaArticle: Tegger is creating a fair data economy, that recognizes and values users’ role in the online data value chain

features.title: FEATURES
features.sectionA: Turn data sharing on or off with one click
features.sectionC: Get additional rewards for completing surveys
features.sectionD: Reward content creators you love (coming soon)

HIW.hiwSubTitle: Tegger tracks the data points you choose to share through your interactions with partner sites
HIW.hiwDescription: Tegger uses a login to let you choose what types of data you want to share and input additional information. In exchange, you receive tokens which can be traded for rewards.

title: DATA OPT-IN
REWARDS MODEL
args: what types of data you want to share. Tegger will only track data points you have consented to sharing.
you earn tokens very time you share data by completing surveys or browsing on partner sites while logged in.

onboarding.OBSubTitle: Tegger uses a login to let you choose what types of data you want to share and input additional information. You receive tokens for your interactions with partner content and for sharing self-reported information. You can trade the tokens for rewards on our marketplace.

article.title: What are Tegger tokens?
article.subTitle: The Tegger tokens (UIT) are a digital representation of the value of your data
article.msg: You can get them when you navigate on our affiliate's sites and completing data missions. The more missions you complete, the more rewards you'll get. Exchange your tokens for exclusive rewards on our marketplace
